name: Agentnoon
headline: Org design and workforce planning platform to drive org transformation
description: 🚀 Enable strategic decision making using a fast, flexible, and intuitive org design and workforce planning platform. ⚡

founders.name: Ali Nawab, Founder
founders.description:
building Agentnoon (YC W22)
prev: cofounder @kiwidotai (acquired) @sentiance 
alum: #ODF4. Booz&Co. Ivey. Deloitte Consulting. FAST-NU 🇨🇦 🇵🇰

please contact me for anything I can help you with via Twitter or LinkedIn

founders.name: Dave Y. Kim, Founder
founders.description:
CTO at Agentnoon.com (We are hiring!)
Previously founding engineer at kiwidotai (acquired), head of mobile then integration lead at Sentiance.

#  **Transformations** **Org Design** **Outcomes** **Mergers** **People Analytics** Faster with AI
AI-powered org design and workforce planning platform built to drive organizational transformation
[ Book a Demo ](https://agentnoon.com/<https:/agentnoon.com/book-a-demo/?nab=0>)
[ ![Agentnoon has 4.8 stars rating on G2](https://agentnoon.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Agentnoon-has-4.8-stars-rating-on-G2.png) ](https://agentnoon.com/<https:/www.g2.com/products/agentnoon/reviews>)
  * Move faster
  * Reduce errors
  * Track continuously


![Agentnoon Platform](https://agentnoon.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Hero-Image-e1733194476987-1024x396.png)
![Nestle - Agentnoon Customer](https://agentnoon.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Nestle.png)
![NYU Agentnoon Customer](https://agentnoon.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/NYU.png)
![Etihad Airways Agentnoon Customer](https://agentnoon.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/EA.png)
![Autodesk Agentnoon Customer](https://agentnoon.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/AD.png)
![Kenvue Agentnoon Customer](https://agentnoon.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Kenvue.png)
![Superhuman Agentnoon Customer](https://agentnoon.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/Superhuman.png)

![Canadian Solar Agentnoon Customer](https://agentnoon.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/CS.png)
![Align Org Agentnoon Customer](https://agentnoon.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/AlignOrg.png)
![Bevington Group Agentnoon Customer](https://agentnoon.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Bevington-Group.png)
![Deloitte Agentnoon Customer](https://agentnoon.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Deloitte.png)

![SPS Commerce Agentnoon Customer](https://agentnoon.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/SPS-commerce.png)
![The Arch Co Agentnoon Customer](https://agentnoon.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Arch-company.png)
![FreeRange Games Agentnoon Customer](https://agentnoon.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Free-range-games.png)
![AA Agentnoon Customer](https://agentnoon.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/The-AA.png)
![Informa Agentnoon Customer](https://agentnoon.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Informa.png)
![Yoco Agentnoon Customer](https://agentnoon.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/Yoco-1.png)
## 70% of enterprise transformations fail because org design and workforce planning is broken
Lack of alignment, overcomplicated tech and processes, and limited tracking cost organizations millions of **$$$** every month. 
####  Inefficient planning 
Every stakeholder is speaking a different language, with no common understanding of the overall objective.
####  Slow and complicated tooling 
Manual data cleansing, unintuitive technology, and inaccurate reports 10x complexity and cost.
####  Lack of accountability 
Lack of KPIs, tracking and monitoring leads to a lot of talks about strategy, but no actual execution. 
## Do the work of weeks in minutes, align teams and keep them accountable
Agentnoon helps you streamline org transformation faster
#### Democratize org transformation
Get every level of the organization involved. Design and model in one unified canvas. 
![Agentnoon Interface](https://agentnoon.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Group-8248.png)
#### Understand impacts in real time
Translate human capital decisions into financial impact without manual effort.
![Impact Analysis in Agentnoon](https://agentnoon.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Group-8247-1.png)
#### Drive organizational performance 
Track and monitor execution continuously. Hit your targets, every time. 
![Agentnoon-Salarysheet](https://agentnoon.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Group-8249.png)
## Here's how it works
Our platform empowers your organizational design and workforce planning processes with a fast start, intuitive technology, and streamlined workflows.
####  Ingest your data 
Connect and map financial and operational data from any source. 
STEP 1
####  Design your org 
Create scenarios to model every business situation.
STEP 2
####  Assess the impact 
Analyze real time financial and structural impacts of every decision.
STEP 3
######  Customer Stories 
## Discover how global enterprises transformed using our platform
[ ](https://agentnoon.com/<https:/player.vimeo.com/video/1024745364?playlist=1024745364&muted=1&autoplay=1&loop=no&controls=1&start=&end=>)
![Etihad Airways Review](https://agentnoon.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Screenshot-2024-10-30-at-9.42.54-AM.png)
![Eithad Airways Logo](https://agentnoon.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Etihad-Airways-Logo-1.png)
"Agentnoon has been well received in our organization. It has proven to be very useful now and will continue to be in the future."
##### Angela Montoya
Head of HR Process, Data & Technology
[ Read more reviews ](https://agentnoon.com/<https:/agentnoon.com/why-agentnoon/wall-of-love/>)
######  Integrations 
## Integrate anything, understand everything
Work with the most accurate picture of your business. With Agentnoon, all relevant data from your business is pulled together in real time.

generated_description:
Agentnoon is a Toronto-based company that was founded in 2021 as part of the Y Combinator Batch W22. Its mission is straightforward yet ambitious: to provide an organizational design and workforce planning platform that facilitates effective organizational transformation. With a compact team of 16, Agentnoon aims to help businesses make strategic decisions quicker and more efficiently through an intuitive platform.

The crux of Agentnoon’s offering is its ability to democratize organizational transformation. It allows users at all levels to engage in the design and modeling of their organization using a unified interface. This speeds up the process, transforming weeks of work into just minutes and aligning stakeholders who might otherwise operate on different objectives.

Agentnoon’s platform is powered by AI and includes features for intelligent design, scenario generation, and real-time impact assessment. It helps organizations tackle pressing challenges — around 70% of enterprise transformations fail due to issues in organizational design and workforce planning. Inefficiencies can cost companies significantly, hence Agentnoon focuses on simplifying complex tech and processes, ensuring accountability through continuous tracking, and providing insight into data-driven decisions.

Their client base ranges from Nestle to NYU and Etihad Airways, underscoring their credibility and effectiveness in driving results. Customers can expect reduced errors, faster execution, and enhanced tracking, all of which lead to improved organizational performance.

If you're curious about how your organization can leverage Agentnoon’s capabilities, they offer demos on their website, allowing potential users to explore the platform's features firsthand. Want to learn more? You can find them online at [agentnoon.com](https://agentnoon.com).
